entry.title: Monday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: A few rain showers or flurries ending late this evening then partly cloudy. Fog patches developing overnight. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 6:22 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 3.
